channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Please Stand By
channel.desc: Wendy, a young woman with autism and a love for Star Trek, escapes her group home. She embarks on a journey to deliver her script to Paramount, hoping to prove her independence to her family.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Lawless
channel.desc: Three siblings operate an illegal moonshine business using their restaurant as a front. Things take a turn when the oldest brother, Forrest, refuses to pay a bribe to a corrupt lawman.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Universal Soldier: Day of Reckoning
channel.desc: After waking up from a coma, John vows to kill the man responsible for the death of his wife and daughter. However, his vengeance leads him to encounter a terrifying army of reanimated supersoldiers.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Train to Busan 2: Peninsula
channel.desc: A former soldier along with his teammates sets out on a mission to battle hordes of post-apocalyptic zombies in the Korean peninsula wastelands.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Chef vs Fridge
channel.desc: Judge Vicky Ratnani reveals the theme to Chefs Alpan and Inder. Subsequently, they create Indian dishes using foreign ingredients.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Hotel Mumbai
channel.desc: A hotel staff risks everything to keep its patrons safe during a terror attack, especially a British heiress, her husband and her infant.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Monster House
channel.desc: Three teenagers discover that their neighbour's house is actually a monster that hates children. They then decide to destroy the heart of the house and kill it.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Sniper: Assassin's End
channel.desc: When a sniper is falsely accused of assassinating a foreign public figure, he goes on to seek support of his estranged father, to clear his name.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Vacancy 2: The First Cut
channel.desc: After checking into a motel, a young couple and their friend are horrified to discover they are trapped in their room, watched by hotel employees who delight in torturing guests.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Net 2.0
channel.desc: Hope, a computer systems analyst, goes to Istanbul to start a new job. Her life is turned upside down when she realises that her identity has been stolen and her bank account has been emptied.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Possession of Hannah Grace
channel.desc: Megan, a former police officer who works in a morgue, is tasked with moving a disfigured body. However, she sees terrifying visions that make her suspect that the corpse is possessed by a demon.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Vincent N Roxxy
channel.desc: An unlikely romance develops between Vincent, a loner, and Roxxy, a rebel, while they are on the run to save their lives. However, their violent past seems to catch up with them wherever they go.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Amazing Spider-Man
channel.desc: After a genetically altered spider bites him, Peter Parker develops superhuman abilities and confronts a humanoid reptilian creature.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Premium Rush
channel.desc: Wilee is a bicycle messenger who rides a single-gear bike with no brakes. His routine delivery turns into a dangerous chase when his last package of the day is pursued by corrupt police officers.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Hotel Transylvania: Transformania
channel.desc: When Van Helsing's invention goes awry, Johnny turns into a monster and Dracula becomes human. Later, they embark on a journey to find a cure before their transformations become permanent.
